about.title: Words About Us
about.description: A group of companies operating in several sectors, including real estate investment, gold investment, the Egyptian stock exchange and securities trading, as well as training and qualifying individuals in business, marketing, and technology.

investments.subtitle: INVESTMENT OFFER
investments.title: Our Investment Plans
investments.quote: Don't miss out on something interesting today just because you think you'll find something better tomorrow.

starter.name: Starter
starter.description: Starter investment package for beginners in USD.

infinity.name: Infinity
infinity.description: Conservative portfolio emphasizing capital preservation and steady income through government bonds and blue-chip dividends.

silver.name: Silver
silver.description: A balanced investment package offering stable monthly returns, suitable for investors seeking moderate growth with controlled risk.

gold.name: Gold
gold.description: A growth-oriented investment package ideal for investors aiming to expand their capital through consistent monthly returns and diversified strategies.

platinum.name: Platinum
platinum.description: A premium investment package tailored for experienced investors looking for higher returns through advanced market strategies and disciplined risk management.

diamond.name: Diamond
diamond.description: A high-tier investment package designed for serious investors who seek strong performance, capital growth, and professionally managed investment forecasting.

honestEgy.name: Honest Egy
honestEgy.description: An exclusive elite investment package offering maximum potential returns, designed for high-value investors who demand strategic forecasting, stability, and long-term growth.

footer.companyDescription: Start your investment and trading journey with Honest EG Group of Companies
